title: Ulta Is Having A Super-Rare Sale Right Now And It Only Lasts For A Few More Weeks
text:
Let's be honest: Unless you receive a free gift with purchase, you never see cosmetics on sale.

Enter Ulta's 21 Days of Beauty sale. From now until September 21, Ulta is offering up to 50 percent off some of your favorite cosmetics (yes, that's right: 50 percent off!!).

Here's how it works: Each day, Ulta releases a new crop of discounts, ranging from skincare, to makeup, to tools. Dubbed the retailer's biggest beauty event of the year, you're bound to find something you love.

The catch? The daily deals won't last forever so if you see something you'd like, add it to your cart, stat. Hate being rushed? Check out Ulta's Hot Buys section, which will have great deals through the duration of this beauty extravaganza. Either way, what are you waiting for? You've got a makeup bag to fill.
